i.name: Carnivore
i.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

q.name: Rupture
q.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

w.name: Feral Scream
w.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

e.name: Vorpal Spikes
e.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

r.name: Feast
r.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

riot.name: Carnivore
riot.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

i1.name: Carnivore
i1.blurb: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Cho'Gath''' kills an enemy or destroys an enemy structure, he restores {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|20 to 71}} health}}}} and {{as|{{sti|mana|{{pp|3.5 to 7.75}} mana}}}}.

riot.name: Rupture
riot.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
riot.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for {{ e5 }} second, take {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage, and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

q1.name: Rupture
q1.blurb: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath''' causes the target area to rupture after a {{fd|0.625}} seconds delay, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} enemies hit for 1 second, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds afterwards and dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
notes: * There is a brief cast time that must be completed in order for ''Rupture'' to begin. Unlike [[channel]] times cast ones can only be interrupted by the caster's death.
* The animation is visible in brush and in [[Sight|fog of war]].
* ''Rupture'' grants {{tip|sight}} while its visual effect plays.

riot.name: Feral Scream
riot.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
riot.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} seconds and deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage.

w1.name: Feral Scream
w1.blurb: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath''' roars in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone and {{tip|silence|silencing}} them for a short duration.

riot.name: Vorpal Spikes
riot.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
riot.tooltip:
Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f1 }}% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, decaying over the duration.

Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.
Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at {{ e8 }}.

e1.name: Vorpal Spikes
e1.blurb: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath's''' next 3 [[basic attack]]s within 6 seconds have {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and launch a volley of spikes in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and applying a decaying {{tip|slow}} over the next {{fd|1.5}} seconds to enemies hit.
e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|22 to 70}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 3% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5%}} per {{ai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} stack)|buzzword}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|22*3 to 70*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{as|(+ 9% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5%}} per {{ai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} stack)|buzzword}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}{{st|Slow|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}
notes: * ''Vorpal Spikes'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Cho'Gath's previous orders.
* {{ii|Rylai's Crystal Scepter}} and {{iis|Liandry's Torment}} passives apply to every target hit by the spikes.
* Cho'Gath's size factors into how wide of a hitbox ''Vorpal Spikes'' has. External site modifiers ({{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}}) contribute.

riot.name: Feast
riot.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
riot.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) true damage to champions or {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health.

Only {{ e4 }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/{{ e4 }})

r1.name: Feast
r1.blurb: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath''' attempts to eat the target enemy, dealing {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}}. Against non-[[champion]]s the base damage is increased to 1000.
r1.description2: If ''Feast'' kills its target '''Cho'Gath''' gains one ''Feast'' stack. Only 6 stacks can be gained from non-epic monsters or minions.
r1.description3: Each stack grants him {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}, which can stack up to 255 times, as well as {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}} and increased size that stack up to {{pp|type=Rank|3|17|13|10|1|2|3}} times, for a maximum {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' attack range}}.
r1.leveling3: {{st|Bonus Health Per Stack|{{as|{{ap|80|120|160}} '''bonus''' health}}}}{{st|Bonus Attack Range Per Stack|{{ap|4.5|6|7.5}}}}
notes: * {{cai|Dragon Force|Mordekaiser}} and {{iis|Zz'Rot Portal}} {{ui|Voidspawn|Voidspawns|nolink=true}} do not count toward the 6 stack limit.
* The order in which '''Cho'Gath''' acquires the two types of stacks is irrelevant (e.g. 6 champions and 6 minions, for a total of 12 stacks in any order).
* The health and attack range granted by active ''Feast'' stacks will increase as '''Cho'Gath''' ranks up the ability.
* If an enemy's health is low enough that they will die from ''Feast'' a glowing red ring appears underneath them.
* Nineteen stacks of max rank ''Feast'' with no other HP items (3040 bonus hp) is the point when {{ii|Cinderhulk}} will give more health than {{ii|Warmog's Armor}} or any other item.
* Each stack of ''Feast'' increases its active damage by {{ap|8|12|16}}.
